function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low percentage of participants satisfied with teleworking conditions","Impact":"Decreased productivity, dissatisfaction, and potential for increased contagion in the workplace","Mitigation":"Improve teleworking conditions, provide support and resources for teleworkers","Technologies":"Teleconferencing tools, remote collaboration platforms, virtual office technologies","People":"Teleworkers, supervisors, and employers","Owner":"Employers, HR departments, and teleworking program managers"},{"Description":"Divergence in attitude towards teleworking between different locations","Impact":"Potential for inconsistent management practices, decreased motivation, and lack of cohesion in remote teams","Mitigation":"Standardize teleworking policies, provide training for supervisors, and encourage open communication","Technologies":"Project management tools, virtual team-building platforms, remote monitoring software","People":"Teleworkers, supervisors, and employers","Owner":"HR departments, management, and teleworking program coordinators"},{"Description":"Perceived dissatisfaction with the current form of work","Impact":"Reduced employee engagement, motivation, and potential negative impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Gather feedback, address concerns, and offer flexible work arrangements","Technologies":"Employee feedback platforms, mental health and wellness apps, communication tools","People":"Employees, HR departments, and managers","Owner":"Managers, HR departments, and employee support teams"}]}
